title: WHEN WE LOVE (Ain’t Nobody Series: Book 3)
description: A wedding...A baby...A shooting, but who will be left fighting for their life?Vlad and Holly have overcome so much in their lives and come out the other side stronger and more determined to keep their love alive.Family is everything to the hopelessly devoted couple and adding to the brood has the whole family deliriously happy.However, can the love they hold remain strong and keep this family together, when Vlad becomes irrational after hearing the news that has become a shocking discovery?Holly will not let her family fall apart. Knowing what her husband is capable of, she’s determined to stop him from doing anything stupid, but will he listen to reason and see sense, or will he revert back to the man he once was?WHEN WE LOVE is the third and final book in the Ain’t Nobody Series. The storyline weaves through twists and plots, keeping you engrossed from beginning to end and your emotions running high throughout.Also available on WHEN WE DANCEWHEN WE HURT
author: Tracey Gerrard
